name: FaqSplitText
description: FAQ section with split layout featuring animated text on one side and accordion list on the other.

faqs.example: [{"id": "1", "title": "What is your return policy?", "content": "We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee."}]
faqs.note: Array of FAQ items. Each item requires unique id, title (question), and content (answer with HTML support).

animationType.note: Animation type for accordion open/close. 'smooth' uses height transition, 'instant' shows/hides immediately.

textPosition.note: Position of title/description text relative to FAQ list.

propsSchema.faqs: Array<{ id: string, title: string, content: string }> - FAQ items
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>

usageExample: <FaqSplitText faqs={[{id: '1', title: 'How can I be part of Buenro?', content: 'You can join by signing up on our platform.'}, {id: '2', title: 'Can anyone join Buenro?', content: 'Yes! We welcome remote workers and entrepreneurs.'}]} sideTitle="Frequently Asked Questions" textPosition="left" useInvertedBackground={"noInvert"} />
